Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
